abstract: The stock market last week was a stretch of extraordinary drama and heightened volatility.
snippet: The stock market last week was a stretch of extraordinary drama and heightened volatility.
lead_paragraph: You wouldn’t know it just by looking at the final numbers, which showed the stock market near where it started at the beginning of the week, but it was a stretch of extraordinary drama and heightened volatility.

headline.main: Back Where They Started, but What a Trip
headline.print_headline: Back Where They Started, but What a Trip
